about_me.des: I am a data scientist (PhD Machine Learning) with a strong background in mathematics. Through academic and profesionnal projects, I gained significant data mining, machine learning and coding experience. As a Data Scientist, I consider myself a child playing the data puzzle

projects.name_CD4: High dimensional correlated data | Master's thesis
projects.CD4: Exploring the package HiDimDA of R which is used to make high dimensional classification (LDA) | #R
projects.d3js: Visualizations on french assembly bipartism , flu evolution, and french football ranking. | #html #css #javascript #d3js
projects.Oil: Determine the quality of several wells of a Canadian oil field with their production curves per month using regression. | #R
projects.geoloc: Create a tool to analyse and predict.| #R #Python
projects.velov: Determining the evolution of the city's (velo'v) bicycle fleet and provide statistics and graphical information for each station. #kafka #storm #spark
projects.Kaggle: Kaggle is a platform for predictive modelling and analytics competitions

career.NVC: PhD, Data Science - Machine Learning Consultant
career.NVC_des: I joined Novencia as Data Science Consultant in order to work on Machine Learning and Data Visualization related projects.
career.NVC_course1: Data Science, Machine Learning, Data Visualization
career.master2_des: I chose a specialization in Data Science shared between Mathematics and Computer Science section of the University Lyon 1.
career.master2_job: Master Data Science | Université Claude Bernard Lyon 1 (UCBL) - Ecole Centrale - Liris | Lyon
career.master2_course1: Statistical methods and Regression Models, Probabilistic Graphical Models, Graph Complexity and Combinatory, Data Visualization, Cloud Computing, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Machine learning
career.internship_des: At Panzani, i developped a tool to analyse promotional operations and to make predictions over incoming promotion's ROI (help with the decision) and i participated to the installation of a Big Data structure (Blob, nifi, Kafka, HDFS, Spark)
career.internship_course1: Data collection, Data cleaning, Machine learning, Preprocessing, Nifi, HDFS, Spark
career.PhD_des: Laboratory: Developing an algorithm (regression) which is capable to predict several outputs with groups of corelated variables among those outputs.                             Enterprise: Project manager.
career.PhD_course1: Data collection, Data cleaning, Machine Learning, Multi task regression, Correlated output prediction, Papers: Conditionally Decorrelated Multi-Target Regression, ICONIP 2019, // Identifying Conditionally Independent Target Subsets for Multi-Target Regression, ICTAI-IEE 2020
career.master1_des: In June 2016, I completed my first year of master
career.master1_job: Master in Statistics, Computer Science, and Numerical Analysis | UCBL | Lyon
career.master1_course1: Numerical Analysis, Probabilities, Parametric Statistics, Time Series, Dynamical Systems, Stochastic Processes
career.bachelor_des: At June 2015, I obtained my bachelor in general mathematics
